Package gui_code

Class UiManager

java.lang.Object
gui_code.UiManager
public class UiManager
extends java.lang.Object
The program that manages all the different windows and ensures they co-operate
Author:
nzoli

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private GameEnvironment environment
    The GameEnvironment instance, which holds all game data.

  • Field Details

    • environment

      private GameEnvironment environment
      The GameEnvironment instance, which holds all game data. We cannot actually start the game and fully create this instance until after the pre-game window.

  • Constructor Details

    • UiManager

      public UiManager()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method. Running this program ensures that every window works well in conjunction with the rest of the windows
      Parameters:
      args - Stores the Java command line arguments

    • getEnviroment

      public GameEnvironment getEnviroment()
      gets the game environment instance.
      Returns:
      The game environment instance.

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(java.lang.String name, Ship ship, int duration)
      Finishes setting up the GameEnvironment and all variables inside it, allowing the game to begin.
      Parameters:
      name - The name selected by the player
      ship - The ship selected by the player
      duration - The game duration selected by the player

    • launchPreGame

      public void launchPreGame()
      Launches the PreGame screen

    • launchIsland

      public void launchIsland()
      Launches the island screen. Takes the island instance from the ship's current location So change its location BEFORE you call this method Also checks to see if a game over should occur whenever the window is loaded.

    • launchShipView

      public void launchShipView()
      Launches the ship viewing screen

    • launchSelectSail

      public void launchSelectSail()
      Launches the Island and Route selection window for sailing

    • launchSailingEvent

      public void launchSailingEvent​(Route path)
      Launches the Sailing Event window
      Parameters:
      path - The route that the player is taking there

    • launchGameOver

      public void launchGameOver​(java.lang.String reason)
      Launches the Game Over screen
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason why the game over occured.

    • launchViewIslands

      public void launchViewIslands()
      Launches the island view screen

    • launchBuyWindow

      public void launchBuyWindow()
      Launches the shop buy window

    • launchSellWindow

      public void launchSellWindow()
      Launches the shop sell window

    • closeMainMenu

      public void closeMainMenu​(MainMenu menu)
      closes the main menu and opens up the Pre-Game Menu
      Parameters:
      menu - the MainMenu instance being closed. Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • closePreGame

      public void closePreGame​(PreGame setup)
      Closes the PreGame menu and opens up the first island window
      Parameters:
      setup - The PreGame Instance being closed. Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • inspectShip

      public void inspectShip​(IslandWindow island)
      Closes the Island Window and opens the Ship Viewing window.
      Parameters:
      island - The IslandWindow instance being closed. Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • closeShipView

      public void closeShipView​(ShipView fineVessel)
      Closes the ship view window and opens the Island window
      Parameters:
      fineVessel - The ShipView instance being closed. Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • settingSail

      public void settingSail​(IslandWindow island)
      Closes the island window and opens the island/route selection window for sailing
      Parameters:
      island - The island window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • secSailBack

      public void secSailBack​(SelectSail journey)
      Closes the SelectSail window and opens the Island window
      Parameters:
      journey - The SelectSail window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • sailEvent

      public void sailEvent​(SelectSail journey, Route path)
      Closes the SelectSail window and opens the SailingEvent window
      Parameters:
      journey - The SelectSail window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.
      path - The route that the player is taking

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver​(SailingEvent event)
      closes the SailingEvent window and opens a gameover caused by pirates.
      Parameters:
      event - The SailingEvent window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • finishedVoyage

      public void finishedVoyage​(SailingEvent event)
      closes the SailingEvent window and opens the island window for the destination
      Parameters:
      event - the SailingEvent window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • viewIslands

      public void viewIslands​(IslandWindow island)
      Closes the Island window and opens the viewing island window, for looking at all islands
      Parameters:
      island - The island window being closed. Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • viewIsleBack

      public void viewIsleBack​(ViewIslands window)
      Closes the ViewIslands window and goes back to the regular island window
      Parameters:
      window - The ViewIslands window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • buyThings

      public void buyThings​(IslandWindow island)
      Closes the Island window and opens the shop buy window
      Parameters:
      island - The island window being closed. Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • doneShopping

      public void doneShopping​(BuyStuffWindow window)
      Closes the shop buy window and opens the island window
      Parameters:
      window - The window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • sellThings

      public void sellThings​(IslandWindow island)
      Closes the island window and opens the shop sell window
      Parameters:
      island - The island window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • doneSelling

      public void doneSelling​(SellStuffWindow window)
      Closes the shop sell window and opens the island window
      Parameters:
      window - The window being closed Should be called in the class, so the parameter 'this' should be used.

    • checkDays

      public boolean checkDays()
      Checks if all days have passed or the number of remaining days is not enough to sail anywhere.
      Returns:
      False if there is still time to make an action, True if there is no time.

    • checkCantSell

      public boolean checkCantSell()
      Checks if the player can not sell on this island
      Returns:
      False if the player can sell items, True if the player can not sell.

    • checkEco

      public boolean checkEco()
      Checks if the player has enough money to make an action, also checks if the player can sell goods and then make an action.
      Returns:
      True if the player can not sell and 1)do not have enough money to repair the ship. 2) do not have enough money to take any of the routes to another island, then sets end to true. Otherwise returns false.
